404.TITLE: Error  404
404.TEXT: The page you went to does not exist. You can go to main

SUCCESS_PAID.TITLE: Order has been paid!
SUCCESS_PAID.TEXT: Unfortunately, there were some problems when paying for the order, which our support or the support of the payment system will help you solve.

NOT_PAID.TITLE: Order not paid!
NOT_PAID.TEXT: You have successfully paid for your order. You can watch its status in your personal account, in the list of your purchases.
